name: ICS Mobile Pvt Ltd
description:
At the forefront of digital communication in CPAAS category, ICS Mobile provides businesses with the tools and infrastructure to seamlessly integrate real-time communication solutions into their existing platforms. By leveraging cloud-based technology, CPaaS platforms enable organizations to communicate with customers across multiple channels such as SMS, WhatsApp, voice, Email, RCS and messaging apps through a single, scalable API-driven system.
ICS Mobile primarily serve industries like Retail, BFSI,healthcare, Entertainment, and Automotive, where real-time communication plays a critical role in customer experience and operational efficiency. The ability to integrate services with CRMs, marketing platforms, and mobile apps makes CPaaS a powerful tool for businesses to scale and innovate in the digital age.
focus_areas: Seamless & Secured scalable cPaas Communication across all the channels along with complete technical and operational support Partner detail
